Title: Mens Rotary Aquaspeed chronograph blue dial leather watch AGS00070/C/05
Description: chapelle_jewellery Visit our eBay Shop Add us to your Favourites list > Subscribe to our Newsletter > About Chapelle Delivery The Chapelle Guarantee Mens Rotary Aquaspeed chronograph blue dial leather watch AGS00070/C/05 RRP £139.00 Now £69.50 Description This is a very stylish men's Rotary Aquaspeed watch AGS00070/C/05, perfect for the man about town! The stainless steel case measures approximately 43mm wide including the crown and has a brushed finish. The metallic blue dial adds a touch of colour and matches the the blue dial. There are three sub-dials showing the 24-hour time and chronograph and there is also a date window. The hands and hour markers are white with silver outlines, to match the stainless steel case and buckle. The brown strap is genuine leather with a textured finish and measures approximately 18mm wide. This Rotary Aquaspeed watch AGS00070/C/05 is marked 'water resistant' by Rotary, meaning it is suitable for a wide range of water activities, including swimming and diving. Chapelle Jewellery are authorised Rotary stockists and this men's Rotary Aquaspeed watch AGS00070/C/05 is presented in the official packaging with Rotary's lifetime guarantee, which should be kept validated by three year services. Chapelle Reference: 08140962 Other Brands we stock About Chapelle Chapelle Jewellery is a family run business offering jewellery and watches with discounts of up to 50% off RRP. Orders being sent to international destinations will be sent by Royal Mail International Signed For delivery. Visit our ebay store for our full range >>
